summary: "Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix" is a 2007 fantasy movie, the fifth in the Harry Potter series. Directed by David Yates, it's based on J.K. Rowling's 2003 novel. The story follows Harry's fifth year at Hogwarts while the Ministry of Magic denies Lord Voldemort's return. Starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, and Emma Watson, the film was shot in England, Scotland, and Leavesden Film Studios. With a budget of $150â€“200 million, it grossed $942 million worldwide but Warner Bros. claimed a loss. It received positive reviews and was nominated for several awards. The sequel, "Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince," released in 2009.
title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (film)
